p: The kidney cell lines "Vero" were initiated from a green monkey kidney and were obtained from the National Cell Bank of Iran (NCBI, Pasteur Institute of Iran, Tehran, Iran). Vero cells were maintained and cultures at 37°C with 5% CO 2, in RPMI‐1640 medium supplemented with 100μg/ml streptomycin, 100 units/ml penicillin (Gibco, Pen‐Strep15140), 2 raM l‐glutamine, and 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS) (Bovogen, Australia).
